description.de: 5v5 Double Elimination. 16 Teams. Ergebnis: Top 4 – Ausgeschieden im Halbfinale (2:1 vs. Team Echo).
description.en: 5v5 Double Elimination. 16 teams. Result: Top 4 – Eliminated in semifinals (2:1 vs. Team Echo).

description.de: 5v5 Invite-Only Turnier. 8 Teams. Ergebnis: Platz 3 – Gruppenphase überstanden, Niederlage im Halbfinale.
description.en: 5v5 Invite-Only tournament. 8 teams. Result: 3rd place – Passed group stage, lost in semifinals.

description.de: 5v5 Single Elimination. 32 Teams. Ergebnis: Top 8 – Starke Gruppenphase, Aus im Viertelfinale.
description.en: 5v5 Single Elimination. 32 teams. Result: Top 8 – Strong group stage, eliminated in quarterfinals.
